name: TequendamaFalls
description:
Install instructions

To Play - 

1) Unzip the file

2) Open the "Windows" Folder

3) Open the "Interaction_With_ALS" Application To Play 

Controls 

WASD - Walk/Swim Around 

Shift + W - Run

Alt - Crouch

Ctrl + Space - Prone

W + Space - Ledge Climb

Alt(While Swimming) - Descend Down 

Ctrl(While Swiming) - Ascend
